duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and administer all programs and activities offered at the Club, including Education & Career Development, Character & Leadership Development, Sports, Fitness & Recreation, The Arts, and Health & Life Skills.
Provide effective leadership and direction to staff and Club Members, complying with organization policies and focusing on deepening Club IMPACT.
Develop and manage world-class Club experience using the Youth Development Strategy, and implementing programs to meet the organization’s mission.
Recruit and retain members, promote the Club, and maintain recommended membership levels with a focus on safety and discipline.
Manage, recruit, hire, train, and supervise all Clubhouse staff while building a positive and dynamic relationship between staff and Club members.
Implement Volunteer Program for program support, manage financial resources, and ensure up-to-date technology and information management systems.
Act as the primary point of contact between parents and local schools, maintain a safe and clean Club facility, and support the development of strategic alliances and collaborative partnerships.
Complete all administrative tasks on time and oversee the daily operation of the Child Nutrition Program if necessary.

education_certification.credential: Four-year degree in related field from an accredited college or university preferred, with a minimum of three years' work experience in a similar organization.
